summary: A test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the SegFormer image segmentation model, covering its forward signature, attention and hidden‑state outputs, dataset conversion, Keras training integration, loss computation, pretrained weight loading, and output consistency with the PyTorch version.
business_intent: Ensure the TF SegFormer model operates correctly and remains stable across code changes, providing confidence for production use in computer‑vision segmentation applications.
